Vigilance
[i]Disarming Sigh[/i] – Whenever a creature with power 2 or less attacks you, prevent all damage that creature would deal to you this turn.
[i]Brave Assist [/i]– Whenever Goldmary, Elegant Talent, attacks with a creature with a [i]Pair Up[/i] ability, if that ability would trigger, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
